China coal group says US curbs on Russia to keep prices high, hurt exportsTougher U.S. sanctions on Russia's coal firms will keep global prices of high-calorific-value coal high in the near term, affecting a fifth of the latter's coal exports, a Chinese industry group warned on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 08:57:35 GMT W7NBDVZVRFK5THGNJMFQKHNBQ4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/china-coal-group-says-us-curbs-Russia-keep-prices-high-hurt-exports-2024-03-13/Colleen Howe市场商品
Adidas posts first loss in 30 years but sticks to dividendGerman sportswear giant Adidas posted its first loss in more than 30 years in 2023 on Wednesday as CEO Bjorn Gulden works to turn the brand around after a messy break-up with rapper Kanye West. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 06:34:19 GMT OY24ORS6NRKEPHE2HXLPD2CSDE https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/adidas-warns-2024-sales-decline-over-stocked-north-america-market-2024-03-13/Helen Reid商业零售与消费品
Rising mortgage defaults bring more pain to Chinese householdsChased by debt collectors over a mortgage delinquency in a southern Chinese city, former finance worker Lei Xiaoyu no longer answers her phone as she tries to delay the inevitable. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 06:06:59 GMT AJ32AJ3SLZK35KUXS7FHXJVUQA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/rising-mortgage-defaults-bring-more-pain-chinese-households-2024-03-13/Liangping Gao, Marius Zaharia世界中国
As trade with China booms, some Russian companies are flourishingBusiness at Nikita Minenkov's logistics company, based near the Amur River that marks the border between Russia and China, was going well. Since Moscow's invasion of Ukraine it's gone even better - company turnover has doubled for two years running. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 06:03:57 GMT宝马3Q7M5GZK7VLJ5MGL7HVOSMU https://www.reuters.com/business/trade-with-china-booms-some- Russian-companies-are-flourishing-2024-03-13/Gleb Stolyarov商业
Devastating blast in China's Hebei kills two, injures 26A suspected gas leak caused a blast at a restaurant in China's northern province of Hebei that ripped facades from buildings, damaged cars and scattered debris to kill two people and injure 26, state media and authorities said on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 02:42:34 GMT CSLH3BQMAVIVMGJSSN4KQRTVI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/explosion-hebei-china-restaurant-injures-several-people-state-media-reports-2024-03-13/Liz Lee, Bernard Orr世界中国
Chinese EV giant BYD launches new version of e2 hatchback with lower starting priceChinese electric vehicle giant BYD on Wednesday launched a new version of e2 EV hatchback with a lower starting price than its predecessor.
